name: bed
Description:
A small bed, that barely fits one person. 
There is a hard mattress on top of it.

name: mattress
Description: A mattress on top of the bed. Seems like there is something underneath it.

name: mirror
used:
I can see myself.
 Long curly hair. A thick beard that hasn't been trimmed for a while.
Tired dark brown eyes and thin dry lips.
 So this is me!

name: Peephole
Description: I should use it to see what is beyond this door
used:
There is a guard there!
Thank god he is asleep! I should be careful with the noise!

name: Screw Driver
Description: A small screw driver, shoved under the mattress. It can be useful!

name: toilet
Description: Shit! It looks like it is leaking a bit.

name: Sink
Description: I can at least wash the filth of my face at least
used:
Oh nice! The water is cool!
I feel refreshed as fuck!

name: Tunnel
Description: Looks like I can escape from here!
